title: A.I. Spending Is Accelerating Among Tech’s Biggest Companies
description: Despite the risk of a bubble, Google, Meta, Microsoft and Amazon plan to spend billions more on artificial intelligence than they already do.
content:
Four of the tech industry’s wealthiest companies made it clear this week that their spending on artificial intelligence was not about to slow down.
But the outlays from Google, Meta, Microsoft and Amazon — which all raised their spending by billions ... [460 chars]

title: Big Tech banks on artificial intelligence to drive growth amid job cuts
description: To become ‘future ready’, Indian companies have started investing heavily in artificial intelligence.| Business News
content: Big Tech continues to cut jobs and make advances in artificial intelligence (AI). Amazon has planned to cut up to 30,000 jobs, procedures for which began on Tuesday. According to a Reuters report, the company is doing so to pare expenses and compensa... [3240 chars]

title: Jefferies favours China's AI strategy over US, citing energy advantage and open
description: Jefferies, in its latest report, highlighted that it favours the Chinese approach to artificial intelligence (AI) over the US approach, citing structural advantages in China's energy capacity and the open-source model driving innovation.

title: Bengal Cops To Get AI Cell To Enhance Efficiency, Transparency
description: The Director General of Police of West Bengal, Rajeev Kumar, has issued an order to establish an Artificial Intelligence (AI) Cell in the police department with the aim of enhancing efficiency, transparency, and service quality.
content:

The Director General of Police of West Bengal, Rajeev Kumar, has issued an order to establish an Artificial Intelligence (AI) Cell in the police department with the aim of enhancing efficiency, transparency, and service quality.

title: Meta to raise $30 billion in its biggest bond sale
description: Social media giant Meta Platforms will raise up to $30 billion in its biggest bond offering ever, it said in a filing yesterday, as Big Tech rushes to fund the costly expansion of artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:

title: Malaysia powers up Sovereign AI with Nvidia-backed data centre
description: KUALA LUMPUR: Malaysia has recorded significant progress in developing its Sovereign Artificial Intelligence (AI) ecosystem, following the completion of YTL Power International Bhd's Nvidia-powered data centre in Kulai, Johor.
content:

title: Jio is offering Google Gemini Offer worth Rs 35,000: Check how to avail the offer, who are eligible
description: Reliance Industries and Google are joining forces to bring advanced Artificial Intelligence to India. Eligible Jio users will receive a free 18-month subscription to Google's AI Pro plan. This initiative aims to make powerful AI tools accessible to everyone. The partnership also extends to AI infrastructure and cloud capabilities. This collaboration will significantly boost India's digital future and AI capabilities.

title: FastGPT Emerges as One of the Best No-code and Open-source AI Agent Builders for 2025, Empowering Enterprises to Build Smarter Workflows
description: SINGAPORE, Oct. 31, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- As artificial intelligence continues to revolutionize industries, businesses are increasingly seeking ways to integrate AI-driven automation and intelligence into their operations. FastGPT, positioned as an Enterprise-class AI Agent Builder with no code + low code dual-mode support, has quickly emerged as one of the most powerful AI platforms for 2025. As an all-in-one AI agent-building platform, it allows both developers and non-technical users to easily create and deploy powerful AI applications-catering to both basic setup needs and advanced customization requirements-helping organizations drive digital transformation focused on 'efficiency improvement, cost reduction, and revenue increase'.

title: AI-focused roles lead new tech hirings in India
description: Tech and AI firms are rapidly increasing hiring, with AI-first roles leading new job postings as businesses accelerate adoption of artificial intelligence. Demand for specialists in data architecture, machine learning, and generative AI is surging, making India a key global hub due to its deep technical talent base.
